channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Badly patched pothole has returned, 11th April
item.description:
This section gets patched every year, and disintegrates quickly. Cars hit this at speed when wet, causing issues and spraying loose tarmac against cars in the neighbouring driveways.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 76 Whaddon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large & Deep Pothole on the roundabout, 11th April
item.description:
Deep and dangerous pothole on the turn to Tommy Taylor Lane . Cyclists and motorcyclist should take care.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Tommy Taylor's Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytip at Location, 10th April
item.description:
There is small flytip in the paassing place / layby located at the top of the hill from the entrance to Drypool Farm. The tip is paint pot(s) and plastic rubbish. Please can it be cleared up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Second Report of Flytipping at Location, 10th April
item.description:
This is the second time this flytip has been reported and is still there after a conversation that determined it WAS on part of the highway. The location is in the passing place Field gateway on the Cotswold Way Road between the top of Aggs Hill and the Burnt Oak Crossroads. The tip consist of a mixure of plastics and garden waste. Please can it be cleared up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tip at Location, 10th April
item.description:
The location is Mill Lane Charlton Kings about 100 yards from the sharp corner at Glenfall Lodge going towards Ham Road. The tip is a variety of waste. Please can it be cleared up as soon as possible as the it may be hit by vehicles using the lane.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Glenfall Lodge Mill Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Small Flytip at Location, 10th April
item.description:
The location is Mill Lane just past the entrance to Mill House on the right hand side. Traffic has hit the polystyrene dumped there and spread on the road. There is other material on the verge. Please can it be cleared up as soon as possible.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Mill Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No central road marking on bend or sign to say single carriageway, 10th April
item.description:
The road lines suddenly stop. My understanding is because the carriage way is not wide enough for a central line however there is no signs to say the road narrows. Car debris is increasing (wing mirrors).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 The Red Cottages Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: About a mile of potholes, 10th April
item.description:
From the 40 mph speed signs down Old Gloucester Road to the Tewkesbury Road turning there are about a mile of potholes maybe more which get worse every time i drove down the road. It requires drivers to swerve while driving because the potholes are all over the road. The potholes have been there for around 3 months, possibly longer. The worst of the potholes are where there are builders building new houses.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Barn Close Old Gloucester Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes both carrigeway, 10th April
item.description:
2 large potholes causing vehicles to veer into the other carriageway on the junction outside the twelve bells pub
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Clovelly Ermin Way
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Incorrectly sequenced lights, 9th April
item.description:
Lights for slip leave to Benhall and through for the bus lane are turning red in conjuction with the main lights This is unnecessary and indirect This change had only appeared since recent works and needs fixing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Whittington Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large Deep Potholes at bottom of Hill, dangerous for bikes, 9th April
item.description:
I was cycling through here and this pothole nearly took me off my bike. Really deep and dangerous, there is then a further 3 also quite large potholes next to this one
